Name: A Sad Journey
About the game: A Sad Journey is a beautiful third-person exploration game about a rabbit looking for his missing parents. As the rabbit finds paws to collect, his memories come back and he grows closer to finding the truth of what happened to his parents. Take control of this rabbit and play across various gorgeous levels full of obstacles, interesting memories, and breathtaking music. Key Features: For fans of experimental story-driven games. A personal, intimate story made by a 17 year old solo developer. Importent: A short game that lasts around 15 minutes. You need to play this game in one sitting.
